hero.title: Portfolio
hero.subtitle: Welcome to my portfolio, a space dedicated to presenting my projects and galleries.

home.name: Benjamin Balayre
home.welcome: Welcome to my website, a space dedicated to discovering my background and passions. You will find information about my professional, personal and associative projects.
home.education_desc: Since my childhood, I have been driven by a curiosity for new technologies, which pushed me to pursue my studies in digital engineering at ISEP.
home.experience_desc: My goal is to develop my skills in the digital field, while exploring its challenges and contributing to its development.
home.skills_desc: Here is an overview of the tools and fields I work with daily, between data, visual creation, and digital products.
home.latest_project_desc: Last August, I had the chance to travel to Iceland. From this adventure was born <1>Element of Iceland</1>, a montage that captures the intensity and raw beauty of this trip to the heart of Icelandic landscapes.
home.portfolio_preview_desc: Passionate about photography and video, I share in this section my portfolio and my cinematic travel films. Find here my work, my creations and my latest achievements.
home.associative_preview_desc: My student career is marked by a strong commitment to associations. From the presidency of a drone club to the presidency of a media association, discover my experiences and achievements.

video_editing.title: Video Editing
video_editing.description: I master video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro and Final Cut Pro. I have produced several videos for personal and professional projects.

graphic_design.title: Graphic Design
graphic_design.description: I am comfortable with graphic design software such as Illustrator and Canva. I have had the opportunity to create logos, posters, and illustrations for various projects.

photo_editing.title: Photo Editing
photo_editing.description: I use software such as Adobe Lightroom and Photoshop to enhance my shots. I have created presets and actions to speed up my workflow.
photo_editing.imageDescription: Photo editing for my Japan 2024 album

associative.title: Associative Experience
associative.hero_desc: Welcome to my dedicated space for my volunteer journey. You will find information about my commitments and the projects I have completed within the associations here.

iseplive.title: ISEP Live
iseplive.presentation_desc: ISEP Live is the official media association of ISEP, covering the majority of events organized by associations, including the Integration Weekend, Ski Week, and Sailing Week. We offer training in photography, video, and illustration to our members. Composed of 25 members, this association is at the heart of student life.
iseplive.iseplife_desc: ISEP Life is our mobile application that gathers upcoming events, information related to ISEP students and their association membership, as well as photo and video galleries of past events.
iseplive.path_desc:
Passionate about photography, directing, and producing video projects, my journey within ISEP Live has been a source of personal fulfillment. My commitment began in 2021, when I had just started photography, with the aim of exchanging with competent people.

In 2022, I was promoted to Vice-President. This experience allowed me to participate in and lead collaborative projects that make sense to me. My position as Vice-President taught me to successfully carry out the projects I undertake with my team, thus strengthening my skills in project management, leadership, and teamwork.

vizion.title: Vizion
vizion.presentation_desc:
The Student Office (BDE) Vizion is a dynamic and committed organization whose mission is to energize student life within the school. Composed of 40 active members, the BDE Vizion works all year round to offer an unforgettable student experience.

At the heart of this mission is the Creation pole, in charge of defining the visual identity of the BDE, from communication to the colors of our sweaters, including our logo, and much more. Each member of the BDE Vizion is fully invested in offering varied events and activities that meet the needs and expectations of the student community.
vizion.path_desc:
This experience within the Creation pole of the BDE Vizion offered me a unique opportunity to develop my skills in visual creation. By working on concrete projects, I was able to refine my skills in photography and video production, while collaborating with a dynamic and passionate team.

In addition to acquiring practical expertise, this experience also allowed me to strengthen my skills in communication, project management, and teamwork. I am proud to be part of such a creative and committed team, and I am grateful for the skills and opportunities this experience has brought me.

isepdrone.title: ISEP Drone
isepdrone.presentation_desc:
The FPV drone ("First Person View") integrates a camera that offers the pilot a real-time view through FPV goggles allowing an immersive flight experience.

ISEP Drone is an FPV drone club created in 2021 by a group of enthusiasts.
Our goal is to introduce our discipline to as many people as possible through training, simulator sessions, and flight sessions.
isepdrone.path_desc:
Since I joined the ISEP Drone association club in 2021, I have had the opportunity to contribute to its development. I participated in the creation of the club's visual identity, the organization of the first events, the launch communication, and the recruitment of new members. These experiences allowed me to develop my skills in graphic design, project management, digital communication, and recruitment.

In 2023, I took the lead of the club as president. This experience allowed me to develop my skills in leadership and team management, ensuring the smooth running of the club and motivating members to achieve our common goals.

In short, my journey within ISEP Drone allowed me to develop many transversal skills. It is an experience that I am proud to have lived and which, I am sure, will be an asset for my professional future.

capgemini.title: Intern Consultant – Capgemini Invent (frog)
capgemini.description: Internship within the Frog Customer Data & Tech service. Design of innovative strategies and support for large-scale digital transformations. Consulting missions for general management on strategy, organization, and operational efficiency.

sidetrade.title: Intern Data Analyst – Sidetrade
sidetrade.description: Internship in the Datalake Ingest team. Analysis of datalake data, creation of strategic dashboards (Power BI), and collaboration with R&D and Product teams in an English-speaking environment.

freelance.title: Freelancer – Photographer & Videographer
freelance.description: Production of photo and video content for events and professional projects. Complete management of customer relations, shooting, editing, and artistic direction.

microsoft.title: Observation Internship – Microsoft
microsoft.description: Observation internship within Microsoft, allowing discovery of software engineering professions, exploration of the digital world, and confirmation of orientation towards technologies and innovation.

oslomet.title: OsloMet (Norway) – International Academic Semester
oslomet.description: This programme was part of my Business Intelligence track and allowed me to deepen my skills in data science, artificial intelligence, and innovation, while experiencing a new cultural and academic environment.

isep_ing.title: ISEP – Engineering Cycle
isep_ing.description:
Engineering cycle at ISEP in Paris, with a specialization in Business Intelligence (BI).

ISEP is a digital engineering school located in Paris. It trains generalist engineers in major digital fields: computer science & cybersecurity – electronics & robotics – telecommunications & Internet of Things – imaging – artificial intelligence.

inha.title: Inha University (South Korea) – International Academic Semester
inha.description: For my academic semester abroad, I chose to go to South Korea. During this period, I took a wide range of courses: system programming, leadership, signals and systems, sensor engineering, electronic circuit analysis, and I also acquired basic notions of Korean. This experience allowed me to immerse myself in a new culture, improve my English level, and open up internationally.

isep_cii.title: ISEP – Integrated International Cycle (CII)
isep_cii.description:
Preparatory years at the ISEP engineering school in Paris.

The integrated international cycle (CII) follows a specific program at ISEP, balanced between three teaching areas: fundamental digital sciences | techniques & technologies | languages, cultures, humanities, and sustainable development. It includes an international semester from the second year.
